# Choosing a Load Balancer Solution
Azure provides various Load Balancing services that you can use to distribute your workloads across multiple computing resources - Azure Front Door, Traffic manager, Load Balancer, and Application Gateway.

![Choosing a Load Balancer Solution.](../images/choosing-a-load-balancer-solution.png)

Decision criteria:

- Traffic type.
- Global versus Regional.
- Availability.
- Cost.
- Features and Limits.
- Treat this [flowchart](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/guide/technology-choices/load-balancing-overview) as a starting point.
